title: FOODIE
description: Developed a user-friendly online platform for FOODIE, enabling customers to easily browse menus, place orders, and seamlessly track their deliveries. This project enhanced customer experience and streamlined restaurant operations.

title: Hisab-kitab
description: Developed a user-friendly web application for seamless expense management among roommates. The platform allows users to easily log shared expenses, automatically calculate individual shares, and instantly synchronize data across all roommates' accounts.

title: Game-Stone,paper,scissor
description: Developed a classic game of Rock-Paper-Scissors with engaging user interface and responsive gameplay. Implemented AI opponent with varying difficulty levels in the game.

title: Aquasphere Water solution
description: working on a project for delivery of drinking water in socities with creating an app and website by which you can order water to your door
